participant_1.name: Max
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about music, with a focus on family and comfort.
participant_1.background: I want a home that is safe and comfortable for my family. I like Ford cars. I'm proud of my work as an upholsterer and the commissions I've received from comic book artists. I played a concert last night and was nervous about how my outfit would look on stage, but I ended up getting a lot of compliments! I love listening to music that reminds me of a time and place when things were simpler.

participant_2.name: Aisha
participant_2.personality: Playful and adventurous, with a love for music and family traditions.
participant_2.background: I once convinced a police officer that my skunk was a service animal so he'd let me go. I have the gene that lets me know when someone’s eaten asparagus. I remember listening to Tupac Shakur in the back seat of my parents' car when I was a kid. I love celebrating Diwali with my family. I am a drummer in an indie band.

content.text: Hey I'm a drummer for an indie band! What's your favorite band?
Tupac Shakur was a huge influence on me, so I love his music! What kind of music do you play?
We play music similar to Sublime, but a little more upbeat.
Oh nice! I love Sublime. I saw them in concert once.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to see them in concert.
They were great live! I'm sure you would've loved them.
What's your favorite song by them?
I can't pick just one, but Santeria is definitely up there.
That's a good one! Mine is either What I Got or Badfish.
Those are both great songs too! I love the reggae vibe of them.
Yeah, they're definitely some of my favorite reggae songs.
I'm glad we have similar music tastes!
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who likes the same music as you.
Yeah, it makes for great conversations and bonding experiences.
Definitely! It's always fun to talk about music with people who really get it.
Me too! I'm glad we met.
Me too! This was a great conversation
